comment.body:
> I want to clarify that I am totally in favor of freedom of expression and I see perfect that Zer0net can talk about anything with total privacy.

Well, no, you're not. Neither I'm I, by the way. But at least I recognize it.

> Let's not be naive the creator always maintains control

You seem to miss -at least- part of the point.
That's an idea. Why don't we devise a clever antispam requiring proof-of-work, and then abuse it to make spammers compute for us? ;)
